Our
Mission

Accelerating the combination of real property and technology. Improving the world’s quality of life, work, and communities.

03

Our
Portfolio

Great Jones is a property management platform for the $2 trillion in rental homes owned by small-scale investors.

Juniper Square is the leading investment management solution for the real estate industry.

Procore is a cloud-based construction project management software suite.

OpenSpace is a platform to capture and explore jobsite visual records.

SnapDocs is a software suite which facilitates and accelerates residential mortgage closings.

Cherre is an artificial intelligence software to aggregate, reconcile and analyze real estate data.

VTS is a cloud based portfolio management and leasing platform for commercial real estate owners and brokers.

Kasa is an operator of short term rental accommodations for business and leisure travelers.
